Class TwoFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Function
      • TwoFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Difference, MultiFunction, Product, Quotient, Sum

    public abstract class TwoFunction
extends Function
    A function that contains two other functions, combined using an arithmetic operator.
